metadata.name: Embers In The Snow ~ Flower (Ascension)
metadata.created_by: Raja The Tiger x timenotspace x Who R We Collective
metadata.description:
Embers In The Snow, a 2-part musical piece that was created in commemoration for the A-Bombing of Hiroshima & Nagasaki in 1945. As a part of The Green Legacy Hiroshima project  
On April 16, students and faculty of the Japanese Studies Program in the School of Liberal Arts at IUPUI were joined by a select group of invited guests to plant the sapling, which was grown from the seeds of a 300-year-old tree that survived the atomic bombing of Hiroshima, Japan, in 1945. 
-  
The first part of my original musical piece Embers In The Snow commemorates those who lost their lives and loved ones during the bombings of Hiroshima & Nagasaki. This side is to show respect and reflect upon the past. So that we make grow from the mistakes of humanity and learn to heal and love one another as humans. 
The second part of my original musical piece Embers In The Snow honors those who lost their lives and loved ones during the bombings of Hiroshima & Nagasaki. This side is to bring new light and energy to the modern world so that we make grow from the mistakes of humanity and learn to heal and love one another as humans. Our differences are what makes humanity beautiful.  
Please enjoy!  
Love Raja The TigerüêØüíú
